title: T-minus 0
content:
So good to see you! This is the launching post of my blog. Not a grand project, just sharing my interests and ideas (daily hussles as well) in computer science, math, astronomy, and other artistic topics. Hope this blog will carry some interesting stuff I found and from me through a long time, as long as possible. ヽ(✿ﾟ▽ﾟ)ノ
##   

![ssss](/assets/3.jpg)





#### Notes
Useful sources that helped me build this website: [Deployment](https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1pt411K7o9?p=6&t=80), [Theme](https://zhih.me/hexo-casper-usage/)
